{"document":{"nodes":[{"data":{"color":"black","source":"The Narrator","time_period":["0s BC"],"unique_sources":["Luke"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"object":"leaf","text":"	"},{"marks":[{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"1"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"chapter"}],"object":"leaf","text":"19"},{"marks":[{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"1"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"1"},{"marks":[{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"1"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"Jesus entered Jericho and made his way through the town. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"2"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"2"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"2"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"There was a man there named Zacchaeus. He was the chief tax collector in the region, and he had become very rich. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"3"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"3"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"3"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"He tried to get a look at Jesus, but he was too short to see over the crowd. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"4"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"4"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"4"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"So he ran ahead and climbed a sycamore-fig tree beside the road, for Jesus was going to pass that way. 
	"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"5"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"5"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"5"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"When Jesus came by, he looked up at Zacchaeus and called him by name. "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"red","recipient":"Zacchaeus","source":"Jesus","time_period":["0s BC","Os AD"],"unique_recipients":["Zacchaeus"],"unique_sources":["Jesus"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"5"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"“Zacchaeus!” "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"black","source":"The Narrator","time_period":["0s BC"],"unique_sources":["Luke"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"5"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"he said. "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"red","recipient":"Zacchaeus","source":"Jesus","time_period":["0s BC","Os AD"],"unique_recipients":["Zacchaeus"],"unique_sources":["Jesus"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"5"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"“Quick, come down! I must be a guest in your home today.” "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"black","source":"The Narrator","time_period":["0s BC"],"unique_sources":["Luke"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"6"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"	6"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"6"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"Zacchaeus quickly climbed down and took Jesus to his house in great excitement and joy. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"7"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"7"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"7"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"But the people were displeased. "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"blue","recipient":"The Crowd","source":"The Crowd","time_period":["0s AD"],"unique_recipients":["The Crowd"],"unique_sources":["The Crowd"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"7"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"“He has gone to be the guest of a notorious sinner,” "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"black","source":"The Narrator","time_period":["0s BC"],"unique_sources":["Luke"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"7"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"they grumbled. 
	"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"8"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"8"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"8"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"Meanwhile, Zacchaeus stood before the Lord and said, "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"blue","recipient":"Jesus","source":"Zacchaeus","time_period":["0s AD"],"unique_recipients":["Jesus"],"unique_sources":["Zacchaeus"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"8"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"“I will give half my wealth to the poor, Lord, and if I have cheated people on their taxes, I will give them back four times as much!” "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"black","source":"The Narrator","time_period":["0s BC"],"unique_sources":["Luke"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"9"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"	9"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"9"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"Jesus responded, "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"red","recipient":"Zacchaeus & The Crowd","source":"Jesus","time_period":["0s BC","Os AD"],"unique_recipients":["Zacchaeus","The Crowd"],"unique_sources":["Jesus"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"9"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"“Salvation has come to this home today, for this man has shown himself to be a true son of Abraham. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"10"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"10"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"10"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"For the Son of Man* came to seek and save those who are lost.” "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"black","source":"The Narrator","time_period":["0s BC"],"unique_sources":["Luke"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"11"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"	11"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"11"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"The crowd was listening to everything Jesus said. And because he was nearing Jerusalem, he told them a story to correct the impression that the Kingdom of God would begin right away. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"12"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"12"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"12"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"He said, "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"red","recipient":"The Crowd","source":"Jesus","time_period":["0s BC","Os AD"],"unique_recipients":["The Crowd"],"unique_sources":["Jesus"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"12"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"“A nobleman was called away to a distant empire to be crowned king and then return. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"13"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"13"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"13"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"Before he left, he called together ten of his servants and divided among them ten pounds of silver,* saying, ‘Invest this for me while I am gone.’ "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"14"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"14"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"14"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"But his people hated him and sent a delegation after him to say, ‘We do not want him to be our king.’ 
	"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"15"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"15"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"15"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"“After he was crowned king, he returned and called in the servants to whom he had given the money. He wanted to find out what their profits were. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"16"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"16"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"16"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"The first servant reported, ‘Master, I invested your money and made ten times the original amount!’ 
	"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"17"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"17"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"17"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"“‘Well done!’ the king exclaimed. ‘You are a good servant. You have been faithful with the little I entrusted to you, so you will be governor of ten cities as your reward.’ 
	"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"18"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"18"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"18"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"“The next servant reported, ‘Master, I invested your money and made five times the original amount.’ 
	"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"19"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"19"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"19"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"“‘Well done!’ the king said. ‘You will be governor over five cities.’ 
	"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"20"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"20"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"20"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"“But the third servant brought back only the original amount of money and said, ‘Master, I hid your money and kept it safe. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"21"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"21"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"21"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"I was afraid because you are a hard man to deal with, taking what isn’t yours and harvesting crops you didn’t plant.’ 
	"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"22"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"22"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"22"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"“‘You wicked servant!’ the king roared. ‘Your own words condemn you. If you knew that I’m a hard man who takes what isn’t mine and harvests crops I didn’t plant, "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"23"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"23"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"23"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"why didn’t you deposit my money in the bank? At least I could have gotten some interest on it.’ 
	"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"24"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"24"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"24"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"“Then, turning to the others standing nearby, the king ordered, ‘Take the money from this servant, and give it to the one who has ten pounds.’ 
	"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"25"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"25"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"19","verse":"25"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"“‘But, master,’ they said, ‘he already has ten pounds!’
